text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet R5-v2-0294-for-R4

This value set expansion contains 18 concepts.

SystemVersionCodeDisplay
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-02942.2.0  FRIAn indicator that Friday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-02942.2.0  FriAn indicator that Friday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-02942.2.0  MONAn indicator that Monday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-02942.2.0  MonAn indicator that Monday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-02942.2.0  PREFENDThe preferred end time for the appointment request, service or resource. Any legal time specification in the format HHMM, using 24-hour clock notation
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-02942.2.0  PREFSTARTThe preferred start time for the appointment request, service or resource. Any legal time specification in the format HHMM, using 24-hour clock notation
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-02942.2.0  PrefendAn indicator that there is a preferred end time for the appointment request, service or resource.
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-02942.2.0  PrefstartAn indicator that there is a preferred start time for the appointment request, service or resource.
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-02942.2.0  SATAn indicator that Saturday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-02942.2.0  SUNAn indicator that Sunday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-02942.2.0  SatAn indicator that Saturday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-02942.2.0  SunAn indicator that Sunday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-02942.2.0  THUAn indicator that Thursday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-02942.2.0  TUEAn indicator that Tuesday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-02942.2.0  ThuAn indicator that Thursday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-02942.2.0  TueAn indicator that Tuesday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-02942.2.0  WEDAn indicator that Wednesday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-02942.2.0  WedAn indicator that Wednesday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.

name: R5V20294ForR4
title: Cross-version ValueSet R5.Hl7VSTimeSelectionCriteriaParameterClassCodes for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents content from `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0294|2.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This value set is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
value set `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0294|2.0.0` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source value set is bound to the following FHIR R5 elements:
* 

The following concepts are not included in this cross-version definition because they have valid representations
* _no concepts_

Following are the generation technical comments:

FHIR ValueSet `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0294|2.0.0`, defined in FHIR R5 does not have any mapping to FHIR R4
